predicate.note: Frames file for 'devour' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. I'd like to compare to 'eat', but that hasn't been framed yet. Oh well.

roleset.name: eat ravenously

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yet our efforts are somehow less noble than those of an investment expert studiously devouring press clippings on each company he follows.
example.arg: press clippings on each company he follows

roleset.note: This is the prototypical transitive verb.
